<template>
    <button class="icon-btn-lg">{{label}}</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'IconButtonLarge',
  props: {
    label: String
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

.icon-btn-lg {
  height: 2.4rem;

  font-size: --text-lg;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: var(--grey8);
}
.icon-btn-lg:hover {
  background: var(--grey3);
}

</style>
